description: The IIIF Consortium (IIIF-C) was formed in [June 2015](https://iiif.io/news/2015/06/17/iiif-consortium/) in Oxford, England, to provide steering and sustainability for the IIIF community.  The IIIF-C now comprises more than 40 Founding Members across the globe who have signed the IIIF-C [Memorandum of Understanding](https://iiif.io/community/consortium/mou/), committing to support the growth and adoption of IIIF. IIIF-C provides continued support for adoption, experimentation, outreach, and a thriving community of libraries, museums, software firms, scholars, and technologists working with IIIF.
name: International Image Interoperability Framework Consortium (IIIF-C)
